summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the new image upload feature for recipes. All backend API tests passed (13/13). Frontend UI testing confirmed image upload, display on cards, and deletion all work correctly.

issues: Minor ESLint warning: useEffect missing dependency 'fetchRecipe'

passed_tests: DELETE /api/recipes/{id}/image - Returns 400 when no image exists
Image replacement - New upload replaces old image
Uploaded images are publicly accessible via URL
GET /recipes returns image_url for all recipes
Frontend: Image upload section displays on RecipeDetail page
Frontend: Upload input accepts files and triggers upload
Frontend: Uploaded image displays on recipe detail page
Frontend: Image displays as cover on recipe cards in Directory
Frontend: Delete button removes image and shows upload area again
Frontend: Toast notifications for upload/delete success
critical_code_review_comments: Image compression function works correctly - compresses to max 1200px and JPEG quality 85%
Old images are properly deleted when new image is uploaded
File type validation correctly restricts to JPG, PNG, WebP only
Images are served via /api/uploads/{filename} static files mount
seed_data_creation: Created test recipe 'Test Recipe for Image Upload' for UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image upload feature fully implemented and tested. Backend stores compressed images in /app/backend/uploads/. Images are served via /api/uploads/{filename}. Frontend displays images on recipe cards (Directory.jsx) and allows upload/modify/delete on recipe detail page (RecipeDetail.jsx). All CRUD operations for images work correctly.
